price: (Farawo) aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri, iyi ntumwa yanyu yabatumweho ni umusazi!”
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
